post.description: Create a new API key. The full key is returned only once and cannot be retrieved again. Requires 'api-keys:create' permission.

201.description: API key created successfully. The 'key' field contains the full API key and will not be shown again.

keyPrefix.description: First 12 characters of the key for display

createdById.description: User ID who created this key

lastUsedAt.description: When the key was last used

permissions.description: Array of permissions granted to this API key

updatedAt.description: When the key was last updated

key.description: The full API key - ONLY returned on creation and regeneration. Cannot be retrieved again.

description.description: Detailed description of the API key's purpose

permissions.description: Array of permissions granted to this API key (e.g., ['email:send', 'news:create']). Service validates against allowed permissions.

get.description: Get a list of all API keys. Does not include the full key values. Requires 'api-keys:view' permission.

keyPrefix.description: First 12 characters of the key for display

createdById.description: User ID who created this key

lastUsedAt.description: When the key was last used

permissions.description: Array of permissions granted to this API key

updatedAt.description: When the key was last updated

get.description: Get a single API key by ID. Does not include the full key value. Requires 'api-keys:view' permission.

keyPrefix.description: First 12 characters of the key for display

createdById.description: User ID who created this key

lastUsedAt.description: When the key was last used

permissions.description: Array of permissions granted to this API key

updatedAt.description: When the key was last updated

404.description: Not Found - API key not found

patch.description: Update an API key's metadata (name, description, permissions, metadata). Cannot update the key itself - use regenerate for that. Requires 'api-keys:update' permission.

keyPrefix.description: First 12 characters of the key for display

createdById.description: User ID who created this key

lastUsedAt.description: When the key was last used

permissions.description: Array of permissions granted to this API key

updatedAt.description: When the key was last updated

404.description: Not Found - API key not found

description.description: Detailed description of the API key's purpose

permissions.description: Array of permissions granted to this API key

delete.description: Delete an API key. This action is irreversible. Requires 'api-keys:delete' permission.

404.description: Not Found - API key not found

post.description: Generate a new key value for an existing API key. The old key will be invalidated. The new full key is returned only once and cannot be retrieved again. Requires 'api-keys:update' permission.

200.description: API key regenerated successfully. The 'key' field contains the new API key and will not be shown again.

keyPrefix.description: First 12 characters of the key for display

createdById.description: User ID who created this key

lastUsedAt.description: When the key was last used

permissions.description: Array of permissions granted to this API key

updatedAt.description: When the key was last updated

key.description: The full API key - ONLY returned on creation and regeneration. Cannot be retrieved again.

404.description: Not Found - API key not found

post.description: Check if an API key is valid and return its details. This is a public endpoint that does not require authentication. Updates the lastUsedAt timestamp if the key is valid.

200.description: Validation result. If valid=true, includes the API key details and permissions.

valid.description: Whether the API key is valid

apiKey.description: The API key details and permissions if valid. Undefined if invalid.

keyPrefix.description: First 12 characters of the key for display

createdById.description: User ID who created this key

lastUsedAt.description: When the key was last used

permissions.description: Array of permissions granted to this API key

updatedAt.description: When the key was last updated

post.description:
Upload a file to staging. The file will be automatically cleaned up after 2 days if not promoted.

Requires either session authentication or a valid API key.

**Constraints:**
- Maximum file size: 10MB
- Allowed MIME types: image/jpeg, image/png, image/gif, image/webp, application/pdf

**Usage:**
Send the file as multipart/form-data with a field named "file".

key.description: The unique key to reference this asset

contentType.description: The MIME type of the file

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid file type or size exceeded

get.description:
Get metadata for an asset by its key. No authentication required.

The key is the full path returned when uploading, e.g., `uploads/2024/01/uuid_filename.jpg`

key.description: The unique key to reference this asset

contentType.description: The MIME type of the file

404.description: Not Found - Asset not found

get.description:
Download a file by its key. No authentication required.

The key is the full path returned when uploading, e.g., `uploads/2024/01/uuid_filename.jpg`

200.description: File content with appropriate Content-Type header

404.description: Not Found - Asset not found

post.description: Send a custom email with structured content blocks. Requires API key authentication via Bearer token.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid Authorization header

to.description: Recipient email address (string) or list of recipient email addresses (array)

url.description: The URL the button links to

content.description: Array of content blocks (title, text, or button) to render in the email

post.description: Create a new event. Requires 'events:create' permission.

organizerGroupSlug.description: Slug of the group organizing the event

location.description: Location of the event (physical or online)

imageUrl.description: Main image to display for the event

registrationStart.description: Timestamp for when registrations open. If null, open immediately.

registrationEnd.description: When the registration for the event ends. After this time, users cannot sign up.

cancellationDeadline.description: Deadline timestamp for when users cannot cancel anymore. After this, no-shows may receive strikes.

capacity.description: Maximum number of participants allowed. If null, no capacity limit.

isRegistrationClosed.description: Is the event closed for new registrations? This overrides registrationStart/End

requiresSigningUp.description: Do users need to sign up to attend the event?

allowWaitlist.description: Should users be allowed to join a waitlist if the event is full?

priorityPools.description: List of priority pools, with priority in descending order. Each pool contains a list of group slugs. Users in groups in the first pool have highest priority, then second pool, etc. Users not in any pool have lowest priority.

onlyAllowPrioritized.description: Only allow users in at least one priority pool to sign up. Can only be true if at least one group is in priorityPools.

canCauseStrikes.description: Can this event give strike penalties to users?

enforcesPreviousStrikes.description: Should the system enforce strike rules for this event?

price.description: Price in NOK for attending the event. Can only be set if isPaidEvent is true.

paymentGracePeriodMinutes.description: The time (in minutes) between sign up and payment must be made. After this period, unpaid registrations are cancelled. Can only be set if isPaidEvent is true.

contactPersonUserId.description: User ID of the primary contact person for the event

reactionsAllowed.description: Should users be able to react to this event with emojis?

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of all events with basic information including organizer and category details

nextPage.description: The next page number that can be fetched

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term to filter events by title

parameters.name: expired
parameters.description: Whether to include expired events or not

parameters.name: openSignUp
parameters.description: Whether to include only events with open sign-ups

put.description: Update an event by its ID. Event creators can update their own events. Users with 'events:update' or 'events:manage' permission can update any event.

403.description: Forbidden - You must be the event creator or have events:update/events:manage permission

404.description: Not Found - Not found

organizerGroupSlug.description: Slug of the group organizing the event

location.description: Location of the event (physical or online)

imageUrl.description: Main image to display for the event

registrationStart.description: Timestamp for when registrations open. If null, open immediately.

registrationEnd.description: When the registration for the event ends. After this time, users cannot sign up.

cancellationDeadline.description: Deadline timestamp for when users cannot cancel anymore. After this, no-shows may receive strikes.

capacity.description: Maximum number of participants allowed. If null, no capacity limit.

isRegistrationClosed.description: Is the event closed for new registrations? This overrides registrationStart/End

requiresSigningUp.description: Do users need to sign up to attend the event?

allowWaitlist.description: Should users be allowed to join a waitlist if the event is full?

priorityPools.description: List of priority pools, with priority in descending order. Each pool contains a list of group slugs. Users in groups in the first pool have highest priority, then second pool, etc. Users not in any pool have lowest priority.

onlyAllowPrioritized.description: Only allow users in at least one priority pool to sign up. Can only be true if at least one group is in priorityPools.

canCauseStrikes.description: Can this event give strike penalties to users?

enforcesPreviousStrikes.description: Should the system enforce strike rules for this event?

price.description: Price in NOK for attending the event. Can only be set if isPaidEvent is true.

paymentGracePeriodMinutes.description: The time (in minutes) between sign up and payment must be made. After this period, unpaid registrations are cancelled. Can only be set if isPaidEvent is true.

contactPersonUserId.description: User ID of the primary contact person for the event

reactionsAllowed.description: Should users be able to react to this event with emojis?

delete.description: Delete an event by its ID. Event creators can delete their own events. Users with 'events:delete' permission can delete any event. This action is irreversible and will remove all associated data, including registrations and feedback.

403.description: Forbidden - You must be the event creator or have events:delete permission

404.description: Not Found - Event with the specified ID does not exist

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific event, including registration status for the authenticated user if available

enforcesPreviousStrikes.description: Does the event enforce previous strikes for registration

updatedAt.description: When the registration was last updated by the system (moving waitlist position etc.)

waitlistPosition.description: The user's position in the waitlist. Is null if not on the waitlist

attendedAt.description: When the user was registered as an attendee by TIHLDE for this event. Is null if not attended.

registration.description: The current user's registration information. This is null if not registered or if not logged in.

put.description: Mark or unmark an event as a favorite for the authenticated user

404.description: Not Found - Event not found

get.description: Retrieve a list of all events you have marked as favorite.

createdAt.description: When you added this event to your favorites

post.description: Create a new registration for the authenticated user to attend an event, initially with pending status

404.description: Not Found - Event not found

409.description: Event is not open for registration or user already registered

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of users registered for a specific event, including registered and waitlist counts

nextPage.description: The next page number that can be fetched

delete.description: Remove the authenticated user's registration from an event

post.description: Initiates a Vipps payment for an event registration. User must have a registered status for the event.

400.description: Bad Request - event not found or not a paid event

404.description: Not Found - Event or registration not found

409.description: Payment already exists for this user and event

returnUrl.description: URL to redirect user after payment

post.description: Webhook endpoint for Vipps to notify about payment status changes. Updates payment record based on Vipps payment state.

404.description: Not Found - Payment not found

Get a form by ID with all fields and options

404.description: Not Found

403.description: Forbidden - Cannot submit to this form

get.description: Returns paginated list of notifications for the authenticated user, ordered by most recent first

nextPage.description: The next page number that can be fetched

delete.description: Delete a notification by ID. User must be authenticated and own the notification.

404.description: Not Found - Notification not found or not owned by user

patch.summary: Mark notification as read or unread

isRead.description: Whether notification should be marked as read

get.description: Retrieve a list of all groups. Supports optional filtering by type and search query.

post.description: Create a new group. Requires 'groups:create' permission.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid input or slug already exists

finesActivated.description: Whether fines are activated for this group

finesAdminId.description: User ID of the fines administrator

get.description: Retrieve all groups the authenticated user is a member of, including membership info.

200.description: List of groups the user is a member of

patch.description: Partially update an existing group by its slug. Only provided fields will be updated. Requires being a group leader OR having 'groups:update' permission (globally or scoped to this group).

403.description: Forbidden - Not a group leader or missing groups:update permission

404.description: Not Found - Group with the specified slug does not exist

finesActivated.description: Whether fines are activated for this group

finesAdminId.description: User ID of the fines administrator

delete.description: Delete a group by its slug. Requires being a group leader OR having 'groups:delete' permission (globally or scoped to this group). This action is irreversible and will remove all associated data, including memberships and fines.

403.description: Forbidden - Not a group leader or missing groups:delete permission

404.description: Not Found - Group with the specified slug does not exist

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific group by its slug identifier.

groupSlug.description: Group slug that issued the fine

groupSlug.description: Group slug that issued the fine

get.description: Retrieve the authenticated user's settings including preferences and allergies.

isOnboarded.description: Whether the user has completed onboarding

404.description: Not Found - User settings do not exist (user needs to complete onboarding)

post.description: Create initial user settings and mark the user as onboarded. Can only be called once per user.

400.description: Bad Request - User has already completed onboarding

patch.description: Partially update the authenticated user's settings. Only provided fields will be updated. User must have completed onboarding first.

404.description: Not Found - User settings do not exist (user needs to complete onboarding first)

get.description: Retrieve a list of all possible allergies that users can have.
